p: The antioxidant activity of MpEO was compared to that of silymarin, a well-known antioxidant, using two different assays, namely DPPH and superoxide oxygen radicals inhibition, the results are reported in TableÂ 2. DPPH showed for MpEO an IC50 value around 3 times higher than the one recorded for silymarin indicating that antioxidant activity of MpEO was lower than that of silymarin.
